backend/main.mo: Empty actor canister with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for key frontend files describing app flow, neon effects, and evasive logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup and CSS variables for pink/white theme with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the Valentine prompt, evasive button behavior, and success state.
frontend/src/components/NeonHeartsBackgr: Canvas component drawing floating neon hearts with pointerâ€‘interactive repulsion and glow.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMeme.tsx: Displays a meme image and caption for the success state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing backend actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook computing random safe positions for the evasive button while avoiding the center and yess button zone.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme variables and custom neon text/button styles with glow animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that initializes React Query, wraps the app with Internet Identity, and mounts the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, radius, shadows, fonts, and animations using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Valentine-themed interactive webpage, its features, requirements, and architectural notes.
